snippet.title: Forever Lost (Game-play Trailer) by Glitch Games
snippet.description:
http://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/forever-lost-episode-1-hd/id542364897?mt=8

--

Work has now started on episode 2 and you can follow the development on either our main facebook and twitter accounts or ones set up just for the game, or all of them :-)

https://www.facebook.com/GlitchGames
http://twitter.com/GlitchGames

https://www.facebook.com/ForeverLostGame
http://twitter.com/ForeverLostGame

We're actively looking for feedback and suggestions etc so please get involved :-)
